channel.title: Structural Solutions is Amazing!
channel.description: I just snagged Structural Solutions by Mike Skinner (not sure if he is on discord) but it is a really well thought out addition to the game. Specifically designed to build superstructures for your factory, it is amazing at adding architecture to your builds. I hope that Mike will work with Smart @Algalish (Smart!) & Factory Skyline (Cephidqq) to integrate these new parts into their modes.

item.title: Structural Solutions is Amazing!
item.dc:creator: @Richard_Barnes Richard Barnes
item.description:
@Richard_Barnes wrote:

I just snagged Structural Solutions by Mike Skinner (not sure if he is on discord) but it is a really well thought out addition to the game. Specifically designed to build superstructures for your factory, it is amazing at adding architecture to your builds. I hope that Mike will work with Smart @Algalish (Smart!) & Factory Skyline (Cephidqq) to integrate these new parts into their modes.
